patternSteps.2: Step 1. Move the left foot to B, forming a left walking stance toward B while executing a high side block to B with the left outer forearm.
patternSteps.3: Step 2. Execute a middle punch to B with the right fist while maintaining a left walking stance toward B.
patternSteps.4: Step 3. Move the left foot on line AB, and then turn clockwise to form a right walking stance toward A while executing a high side block to A with the right outer forearm.
patternSteps.5: Step 4. Execute a middle punch to A with the left fist while maintaining a right walking stance toward A.
patternSteps.6: Step 5. Move the left foot to D, forming a right L-stance toward D while executing a middle guarding block to D with a knife-hand.
patternSteps.7: Step 6. Move the right foot to D forming a right walking stance toward D while executing a middle thrust to D with the right straight fingertip.
patternSteps.8: Step 7. Twist the right knife-hand together with the body counter clockwise until its palm faces downward and then move the left foot to D, turning counter clockwise to form a left walking stance toward D while executing a high side strike to D with the left back fist.
patternSteps.9: Step 8. Move the right foot to D forming a right walking stance toward D while executing a high side strike to D with the right back fist.
patternSteps.10: Step 9. Move the left foot to E, turning counter clockwise to form a left walking stance toward E while executing a high side block to E with the left outer forearm.
patternSteps.11: Step 10. Execute a middle punch to E with the right fist while maintaining a left walking stance toward E.
patternSteps.12: Step 11. Move the left foot on line EF, and then turn clockwise to form a right walking stance toward F while executing a high side block to F with the right outer forearm.
patternSteps.13: Step 12. Execute a middle punch to F with the left fist while maintaining a right walking stance toward F.
patternSteps.14: Step 13. Move the left foot to CE forming a left walking stance toward CE, at the same time executing a high wedging block to CE with the outer forearm.
patternSteps.15: Step 14. Execute a middle front snap kick to CE with the right foot, keeping the position of the hands as they were in 13.
patternSteps.16: Step 15. Lower the right foot to CE forming a right walking stance toward CE while executing a middle punch to CE with the right fist.
patternSteps.17: Step 16. Execute a middle punch to CE with the left fist while maintaining a right walking stance toward CE. Perform 15 and 16 in a fast motion.
patternSteps.18: Step 17. Move the right foot to CF forming a right walking stance toward CF while executing a high wedging block to CF with the outer forearm.
patternSteps.19: Step 18. Execute a middle front snap kick to CF with the left foot, keeping the position of the hands as they were in 17.
patternSteps.20: Step 19. Lower the left foot to CF forming a left walking stance toward CF while executing a middle punch to CF with the left fist.
patternSteps.21: Step 20. Execute a middle punch to CF with the right fist while maintaining a left walking stance toward CF. Perform 19 and 20 in a fast motion.
patternSteps.22: Step 21. Move the left foot to C forming a left walking stance toward C, at the same time executing a rising block with the left forearm.
patternSteps.23: Step 22. Move the right foot to C forming a right walking stance toward C while executing a rising block with the right forearm.
patternSteps.24: Step 23. Move the left foot to B, turning counter clockwise to form a sitting stance toward D while executing a middle side strike to B with the left knife-hand.
patternSteps.25: Step 24. Bring the left foot to the right foot and then move the right foot to A forming a sitting stance toward D while executing a middle side strike to A with the right knife-hand.
patternSteps.26: End: Bring the foot back to a ready position
